intro001.name: CharTest
intro001.text: Something is wrong with this place

intro002.name: CharTest
intro002.text: I need to get out of here, fast!

intro003.name: CharTest
intro003.text: Use [A] and [D] to move me around, [space] to jump and [shift] to sprint

intro004.name: CharTest
intro004.text: Use [E] to interact with levers, each lever open a door!

intro005.name: CharTest
intro005.text: And don't forget to blink with [left mouse button], I don't have iron eyes!

item001.name: Alavanca
item001.text: Voce acessou uma fala do item
